title: Meditation Crystal Roller
description: A grounding and centering blend of Frankincense, Patchouli, and Cedarwood which in parts a feeling of connection and oneness. Lapis Lazuli is a powerful healing crystal used throughout civilizations to open intuition and ward off evil.
cleaned_text: Meditation Crystal Roller [](/products/meditation-crystal-roller) Meditation Crystal Roller Ingredients Ingredients Bamboo topped roller Protection Essential Oil Blend MCT oil Turquoise Usage Usage Roll over base of neck, wrists, or temples.
